tool.name: Zonal Multiple Regression Analysis (Points and Predictor Grids)
tool.description: Linear regression analysis of point attributes using multiple predictor grids. Details of the regression/correlation analysis will be saved to a table. The regression function is used to create a new grid with regression based values. The multiple regression analysis uses a forward selection procedure. Each polygon in the zones layer is processed as individual zone. <br/>Reference:<br/>- Bahrenberg, G., Giese, E., Nipper, J. (1992): 'Statistische Methoden in der Geographie 2 - Multivariate Statistik', Stuttgart, 415p.<br/>

param.name: P_VALUE
param.label: Significance Level
param.help: Significance level (aka p-value) as threshold for automated predictor selection, given as percentage
